item.description:
Most events will be in the southeastern MA triangle - Braintree - Cape Cod - Fall River. And is open to singles, couples and single parents.

This group is about active and getting together for some fun outside. Activities include but certainly aren’t limited to - hiking, biking, inline skating, snowshoeing, cross-country skiing, kayaking, rock wall climbing, idle conversation, laser tag, rafting, casual strolls, beer sipping and the occaisional wine tasting.

I will try to schedule weekly hike or bikes at local rail trails or state parks. Then every month or two a special event such as a rafting or kayaking. I would like to keep the group’s activities as uncomplicated and inexpensive as possible in order to make them assessable to more people. All ages are welcome and I plan on making some events child friendly.

topics_item.name: Singles Dancing Parties Over 35's Dating Dining

item.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club
